name: Basic Package
information: AstroScale will create 1 design per week

name: Normal Package
information2: AstroScale will create 2 designs. Choose 2 static designs/same designs animated.

name: Astro Package
information3: 1 design per day for 4 days a week
information3.3: 4 animated designs or/and 4 static designs or 2 and 2.

name: Business Package
information4: Designing every day for 5 days a week.
information4.4: 4 animated designs or/and 4 static designs or 2 and 2.
option4: Designs will be created 2 per day, any style.
